description:
'''Timothy John Follin''' (born 19 December 1970) is an English [[video game music]] composer, cinematographer, visual effects artist and game developer, who has written tracks for a variety of titles and home gaming systems, including the [[ZX Spectrum]], [[Commodore 64]], [[Amiga]], [[Atari ST]], [[Nintendo Entertainment System]], [[Sega Genesis|Mega Drive]], [[Super Nintendo Entertainment System|Super NES]], [[Game Boy]], [[Dreamcast]], and [[PlayStation]].

Follin has also co-founded a TV advertising company called ABF Pictures and a general-purpose media company called Baggy Cat Ltd, which to date has produced two video games, ''[[Contradiction: Spot the Liar!|Contradiction]]'' and ''At Dead of Night,'' the latter receiving massive attention and acclaim on Steam.

Among Follin's works are the soundtracks to ''[[Solstice (1990 video game)|Solstice]]'', ''[[Silver Surfer (video game)|Silver Surfer]]'', ''[[Spider-Man/X-Men: Arcade's Revenge]]'', ''[[Plok!]]'', and ''[[Ecco the Dolphin: Defender of the Future]]''.
